Notifications.NoGM: There is no active Gamer Master online. Game Master's presence is required to vote.

CreatePoll.name: Create Poll
CreatePoll.hint: Opens a Dialog for creating a poll.

QuickPolls.name: Create Quick Poll
QuickPolls.hint: Opens a Dialog for creating a poll using a template.

console.__COMMENT__: Messages below are not typically expected to be seen by playes

errors.undefined-event: API Error: Wrong Socket Event Received: {event}
errors.noPoll: Poll with ID {id} does not exist, or message is not a poll.
